title: Use Case Shared
description: Schema for use case shared JSON files that define how a mud-level use case relates to a sea-level use case. Files are located in the 'use_case_shares/' directory under a subdomain (e.g., 'use_case_shares/mud_uc.sea_uc.ucshare.json'). If validation fails, verify 'share_type' is present and non-empty.

uml_comment.description: Optional UML comment for diagram annotations.
